coreAttributes.name: Rudolph's Egg nog
coreAttributes.description: The label on the front of this carton declares it to be 'Rudolph's Egg Nog'. The drink's namesake, a buff, stark-naked reindeer-boy, is shown on the label to be drinking a glass of egg nog while receiving oral sex from three enraptured reindeer-girls.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)]

A soothing wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: Opening the carton of Rudolph's Egg Nog, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] it up to [npc.her] [npc.lips] and [npc.verb(start)] drinking. Although there's nothing out of the ordinary about its creamy, sweet taste, [npc.name] soon [npc.verb(discover)] that the egg nog leaves a strange, slightly salty aftertaste lingering on [npc.her] [npc.tongue].
